comments.text:
Been trying to play around with Molt Reconstruct/Hunter Adrenaline/Arcane Persistence. I know there’s something here, but finding a frame I like with this has been the hard part since I gravitate more towards gun platforms over caster frames.

Might need to pull out the Hydroid again.
comments.author: @BG-3496

comments.text: This gives me another huh I wonder, with the large health orbs that drop from protea dispensary would that push the threshold over for persistence, because I feel like she could potentially use it build depending
comments.author: @generalskittles8354

comments.text: I have a friend of mine doesnt use anything other besides qorvex he legit has over 370K kills with just his qorvex😭
comments.author: @TOYRaiden

comments.text:
Now, if only digital extremes would fix arcane persistence and its interactions with overguard and quick thinking.... Its the last bit i need to make my Garunda actually invincible but the inconsistent interactions with both just makes her mostly invincible. 

The percent healing from her 2 does go a decently long way tho so maybe I just need to change the build up.
comments.author: @Its-Just-Zip

comments.text: I wish weapon platform qorvex like this was less janky. I love the concrete gorilla style wise but think his beam playstyle is incredibly boring. A setup like this is more fun but is missing something still. Maybe an augment for his 3 for some healing or extra damage somehow would do the trick.
